review: It was like describedThank you amazon
author: Abdullah

review: I was expecting Amazon Prime to be enabled after these many years. It's a disservice to customers. Same with Pandora. It's a streaming service millions have already. Does Apple think Steve Jobs returned the company from missery to glory by not giving people what they need?Other than that the product works ok, is simple to operate and is aesthetically beautiful.
author: F. Ferreres

review: Great for streaming your favorite shows. Especially now that you get order HBO as a stand alone service thru apple. The down side to this great device is the lack of ability to add the apps you want. You are stuck with the ones apple wants you to have. It's still a great streaming device overall.
author: M. Myers "Mike"

review: I love Apple TV's. We have 3 of them. One of each TV!
author: Rjark7

review: Good product and have used these for years. Just got this one for Netflix and iTunes for the kids room.
author: Paul Mitchell "Traveler"
